data.title: Wipro Science Education
data.meta_description: Discover how Mercy University's Center for STEM Education partners with Wipro for innovative science education. Explore programs and opportunities today.
data.text:
In 2022 Wipro Ltd. awarded $480,000 to

MCCSE for a new program, Wipro Reimagined,

for continued support of teacher leadership,

inspired by the foundational Wipro Science

Education Fellowship.

Wipro Reimagined supports STEM education

leadership projects led by original Wipro Science

Education Fellows that include their colleagues to

effect district change. This initiative continues for

the next four years, and hopefully beyond. At our

annual K-12 STEM Teacher conference in October,

Wipro Reimagined Director Dr. Kristen Napolitano,

Wipro National Coordinator Dr. Arthur Eisenkraft and

Dr. Gunning facilitated an informational workshop.

Potential grantees brainstormed on leadership projects

connected to their specific district priorities working

with original Wipro Science Education Fellows as

mentors and leaders.
